<h1>
<img src="img/icon.svg" width="54" height="54" align="left" />
So Far From Home
</h1>

[![Play now button](https://img.shields.io/badge/â–¶%20Play%20Now-b342f5.svg?logo=play)](https://fydar.dev/play/sofarfromhome) [![Unity Version: 2023.2.20f1](https://img.shields.io/badge/Made%20with%20Unity-2023.2.20f1-333333.svg?logo=unity)](https://unity.com/releases/editor/archive)\
[![Global Game Jam](https://img.shields.io/badge/Global%20Game%20Jam%202019-3d3163.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/so-far-home)

Searching between the sofa cushions for a missing key, but what else is down there? Every item to you find tells a little piece of the story of your life and friendships.

[![Gameplay Screenshot](./img/title.JPG)](https://fydar.dev/play/sofarfromhome)

**Global Game Jam 2019**\
**Theme**: "Home"
